laboratory_examinations.findings: Subepidermal microvesicle; lack of laminin-5 at the basement-membrane zone.
14,200 cells/mm³ (61% polymorphonuclear leukocytes, 29% lymphocytes, and total eosinophil count of 748 cells/mm³).

laboratory_examinations.date: Ten days after initial evaluation at age 10.8 years
laboratory_examinations.findings: Spongiotic dermatitis with intraepidermal vesicle formation and dyskeratosis; negative for fungi and immunofluorescence for IgA, IgG, IgM, C3, albumin, and fibrinogen.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Normal dermoepidermal junction with no evidence of clefting.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 311 μg/L (5 μmol/L) - Reference range: 670 to 1240 μg/L (10 to 19 μmol/L).
